s: I ordered the Poochplanet brand specifically, because it's the only bed my dog will lay on (not sure why, but whatever). I received a Trusty Pup brand, and it's a different bed than I wanted. She is laying next to the Trusty Pup bed, and I'm disappointed. ... Much smaller than expected. Not the same as their other older versions. Cheaper by comparison. ... Advertised as 29x36, actual dimensions are 26x32...bed appears well made and comfortable...
